articles.title: Microsoft accidentally wipes out Copilot in latest Windows 11 update - The Verge
articles.description: Microsoft is working to fix a bug in its latest Windows 11 update that removes Copilot. The app can easily be reinstalled, but an update is wiping it out.

articles.title: Old Bolt, new tricks: Making an EV into a backup power station with an inverter - Ars Technica
articles.description: Using a custom kit to make a budget EV offer some emergency power.

articles.title: Rumour: Metroid Prime 4 Will Apparently Make Quite The Splash At The Switch 2 Direct - Nintendo Life
The next big TV panel leap was just unveiled by Sony - and it makes OLED look outdated - ZDNet
articles.description: Sony's new RGB LED display features superior color accuracy and image detail. And TVs with this tech may arrive as soon as later this year.

articles.title: AMD Radeon RX 9070 series distribution said to be divided among two-tier board partners - VideoCardz.com
articles.description: AMD reportedly ships more cards to ‘Core AMD’ partners Board Channels, forums associated with add-in-board partners of Intel, AMD, and NVIDIA, report that AMD’s distribution of the Radeon RX 9070 series is divided into two groups. AMD has allegedly implemente…

articles.title: Controversy erupts over claims Microsoft invented a new state of matter - Salon
articles.description: This discovery could change the computing world entirely. But many are skeptical of their claims
